forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 18 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a golden clarity, as bright sunshine bathes the city in a gentle warmth, albeit moderated by a refreshing breeze. With a high near 65, the temperature dances around a comfortable 62 degrees, inviting a leisurely stroll through the bustling streets. While the sky remains clear for now, one can't help but sense the impending shift as a patchy marine layer lingers close by, hinting at its presence in the distance but allowing the Golden Gate and the cityscape to gleam prominently. The west winds whip playfully at 18 to 22 mph, adding an invigorating chill, which calls for light layers—perhaps a well-fitted jacket or shawl that can be easily removed as the sun continues its ascent.

As evening approaches, the clouds will weave their way into the scene, offering a cozy cover with temperatures dipping to around 54 degrees. The west-southwest winds will continue their spirited dance, their gusts maintaining the fresh breath of the afternoon air. As the sun sets behind the hills, it would be an opportune time to gather friends for a casual dinner at a local café or take in the sunset with a leisurely walk along the waterfront. The beauty of this afternoon promises a refreshing blend of warmth and coolness that resonates with the very spirit of San Francisco.
